description.narrative: Output 5.3: Strengthened political commitment, accountability and national capacity for evidence-based legislation, planning and budgeting for scaling-up quality and inclusive education.,which contributes to Education In Emergencies, Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 5: Improved and more equitable access to and completion of quality, inclusive education with improved learning outcomes.

sector.narrative: Education Management Information System (EMIS) (excluding learning assessment systems)

Provision of skills development for adolescents (10-19 year-olds) (including in temporary learning spaces)
System strengthening - curricula and learning materials design (excluding early-learning / pre-primary)
System strengthening - inclusive education for children with disabilities
